name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in creating high-performance web applications using **TypeScript**, **HTML**, **SASS**, **Angular**, **React**, and **Node.js**. My proficiency in full-stack development is complemented by hands-on experience with **Express**, **MongoDB**, and message brokers such as **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**.
I leverage cloud services, including **AWS**, and utilize **Docker** for containerization, ensuring smooth deployment processes. My expertise in CI/CD practices utilizing tools like **Git**, **GitFlow**, **Bitbucket**, and project management tools like **Jira** and **Confluence** enables me to effectively collaborate within Agile teams.
I have a strong commitment to web application security, adhering to standards set by **OWASP**, **Section 508**, and **WCAG**. My experience extends to modern development workflows, including module bundling with **Webpack** and **Rollup**, as well as testing with **Jasmine** and **Puppeteer**. With a solid understanding of application scalability, I employ **Kubernetes (K8S)** and **Terraform** for orchestration and infrastructure as code, driving enterprise-grade solutions while ensuring compliance with industry standards.
